p: At the end of the treatment period, the animals were anesthetized and sacrificed, then blood samples were collected into non anti-coagulated tubes after overnight fasting. Clinical biochemistry such as aspartate aminotransferase (AST), alanine aminotransferase (ALT), alkaline phosphatase (ALP), urea, creatinine and cholesterol level were evaluated to determine the liver and kidney functions of experimental animals.
